tag.name: tr
tag.help: Defines a row in a table.

parameter.name: align
parameter.help: Defines the text alignment in cells

parameter.name: bgcolor
parameter.help: Specifies the background color of the table cell. Deprecated. Use styles instead.

parameter.name: char
parameter.help: Specifies which character to align text on. Note: Only used if align="char"!

parameter.name: charoff
parameter.help: Specifies the alignment offset to the first character to align on. Note: Only used if align="char"!

parameter.name: valign
parameter.help: Specifies the vertical text alignment in cells

parameter.name: class
parameter.help: The class of the element

parameter.name: id
parameter.help: A unique id for the element

parameter.name: style
parameter.help: An inline style definition

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: A text to display in a tool tip

tag.name: tt
tag.help: The following elements are all font style elements. They are not deprecated, but it is possible to achieve richer effects using style sheets.

parameter.name: class
parameter.help: The class of the element

parameter.name: id
parameter.help: A unique id for the element

parameter.name: style
parameter.help: An inline style definition

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: A text to display in a tool tip

tag.name: ul
tag.help: The <ul> tag defines an unordered list.

parameter.name: class
parameter.help: class_rule or style_rule The class of the element

parameter.name: id
parameter.help: A unique id for the element

parameter.name: style
parameter.help: An inline style definition

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: A text to display in a tool tip

tag.name: a
tag.help:
The <a> tag defines an anchor element. An anchor can be used in two ways:
To create a link to another document by using the href attribute To create a bookmark inside a document, by using the name or id attribute

parameter.name: charset
parameter.help: Specifies the character encoding of the target URL

parameter.name: coords
parameter.help: Specifies the coordinates appropriate to the shape attribute to define a region of an image for image maps

parameter.name: href
parameter.help: The target URL of the link

parameter.name: hreflang
parameter.help: The target URL of the link

parameter.name: name
parameter.help: Names an anchor. Use this attribute to create a bookmark in a document. In future versions of XHTML the name attribute will be replaced by the id attribute!!

parameter.name: rel
parameter.help: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the target URL

parameter.name: rev
parameter.help: Specifies the relationship between the target URL and the current document

parameter.name: shape
parameter.help: Defines the type of region to be defined for mapping in the current area tag. Used with the coords attribute.

parameter.name: target
parameter.help: Defines the type of region to be defined for mapping in the current area tag. Used with the coords attribute.

parameter.name: type
parameter.help: Specifies the MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) type of the target URL

parameter.name: class
parameter.help: class_rule or style_rule The class of the element

parameter.name: id
parameter.help: A unique id for the element

parameter.name: style
parameter.help: An inline style definition

parameter.name: title
parameter.help: A text to display in a tool tip
